definitions: a process by which the fat droplets from milk are emulsified and the cream does not separate

examples.text: after homogenization and pasteurization, milk travels to one of six storage tanks

shortDefinitions: process by which fat droplets from milk are emulsified and cream does not separate

definitions: preparation of a suspension of cell constituents from tissue by physical treatment in a liquid

examples.text: the mechanical homogenization of leaf tissue

shortDefinitions: preparation of suspension of cell constituents from tissue by physical treatment in liquid

definitions: the process of making things uniform or similar

examples.text: the fear of cultural homogenization is a barrier to some multinational businesses

shortDefinitions: process of making things uniform or similar
